meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christi Esterle Matthew Harney Howard Ray Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6873.

td.p: Christi Esterle, a librarian and stay-at-home mom from Colorado Springs, Colorado
Matthew Harney, a research assistant and student originally from Springfield, Illinois
Howard Ray, a laser applications engineer from East Longmeadow, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,200)

tr.td: LET'S PLAY BALL!
BIBLE BOOKS IN OTHER WORDS
A HISTORY LESSON
COOKING TERMS
MODES OF TRANSPORT
THE SPANISH JOB
